trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> evento se produce durante una operación de arrastrar y colocar y permite al origen de arrastre determinar si la operación de arrastrar y colocar tiene que cancelarse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> specifies whether and how the drag-and-drop operation should proceed, whether any modifier keys are pressed, and whether the user has pressed the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> especifica cuándo y cómo debe continuar la operación de arrastrar y colocar, si se presionan las teclas modificadoras y si el usuario presionó la tecla ESC.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, el evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> establece <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> si se presiona la tecla ESC y establece `Action` en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> si se presiona el botón izquierdo, central o derecho del mouse.

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre el modelo de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: This code excerpt demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> class with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event.
trans-unit.target: Este fragmento de código muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> clase con la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> eventos.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> método para el ejemplo de código completo.

trans-unit.source: The current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: Estado actual de las teclas MAYÚS, CTRL y ALT.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the ESC key was pressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se presionó la tecla ESC; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the status of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el estado de una operación de arrastrar y colocar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction" />.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, el evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> establece <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> si se presiona la tecla ESC y establece `Action` en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> si se presiona el botón izquierdo, central o derecho del mouse.

trans-unit.source: This code excerpt demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> class with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event.
trans-unit.target: Este fragmento de código muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> clase con la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> eventos.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> método para el ejemplo de código completo.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the user pressed the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: Averigua si el usuario presionó la tecla ESC.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the ESC key was pressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se presionó la tecla ESC; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.EscapePressed%2A> is true.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> evento establece <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> si <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.EscapePressed%2A> es true.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.EscapePressed%2A> .
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra el uso de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.EscapePressed%2A> .

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo, un controlador de eventos notifica la aparición de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este informe le ayuda a obtener información cuando se produce el evento y puede ayudarle a depurar.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para informar sobre varios eventos o sobre eventos que se producen con frecuencia, considere la posibilidad de reemplazar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> con <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o agregar el mensaje a un multilínea <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para ejecutar el ejemplo de código, péguelo en un proyecto que contiene una instancia de un tipo que hereda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, como un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, asigne a la instancia `Control1` y asegurarse de que el controlador de eventos está asociado con el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el estado actual de las teclas MAYÚS, CTRL y ALT.

trans-unit.source: The current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: Estado actual de las teclas MAYÚS, CTRL y ALT.

trans-unit.source: The bits that are set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.KeyState%2A> property identify the keys or mouse buttons that were pressed during the operation.
trans-unit.target: Los bits que se establecen en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.KeyState%2A> propiedad identifican las teclas o los botones del mouse que se presionaron durante la operación.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the left mouse button is pressed, the first bit in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.KeyState%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, si se presiona el botón primario del mouse, el primer bit de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.KeyState%2A> se establece la propiedad.

trans-unit.source: You can use the bitwise `AND` operator to test for a given key state.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar el bit a bit `AND` operador que se va a probar para un determinado estado de la clave.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the bits that are set for a specified event.
trans-unit.target: En la tabla siguiente se enumera los bits que se establecen para un evento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Bit
trans-unit.target: Bit

trans-unit.source: Key
trans-unit.target: Key

trans-unit.source: The left mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Botón primario del mouse.

trans-unit.source: The right mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Botón secundario del mouse.

trans-unit.source: The SHIFT key.
trans-unit.target: Tecla MAYÚS.

trans-unit.source: The CTL key.
trans-unit.target: La clave de la CTL.

trans-unit.source: The middle mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Botón central del mouse.

trans-unit.source: The ALT key.
trans-unit.target: Tecla ALT.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.KeyState%2A> indicates that the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> evento establece <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> si <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.KeyState%2A> indica que se presiona el botón izquierdo, central o derecho del mouse.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra el uso de este miembro.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para informar sobre varios eventos o sobre eventos que se producen con frecuencia, considere la posibilidad de reemplazar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> con <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o agregar el mensaje a un multilínea <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para ejecutar el ejemplo de código, péguelo en un proyecto que contiene una instancia de un tipo que hereda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, como un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, asigne a la instancia `Control1` y asegurarse de que el controlador de eventos está asociado con el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.
